title: Battery issues
content: Battery draining too quickly and phone immediately shutting down. I can see ny phone reducing in seconds and then switch off. As soon as it hits critical battery of 15% it starts draining in seconds. Also if I watch any video, YouTube, Netflix or Instagram it will start draining like if my battery is at 40% then it will jump to 15% and then start decreasing and shut off.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
